Hey everybody. I have got a question. Can I use NAudio within a Mono Application? I dont need Sound output or Recording.  I just want to encode and decode a mp3 stream.

 

Thanks a lot.

 

pdelvo

No, NAudio cannot encode MP3 even on Windows. To decode MP3, it uses ACM or DMO MP3 decoders, which you won't be able to access with mono. I did make a managed MP3 decoder (nlayer.codeplex.com), but haven't had time to integrate this into NAudio properly yet,

Mark
